snippet: The Yankees’ 40-and-over pitchers, Andy Pettitte and Mariano Rivera, faced hitters in a simulated game. Shortstop Derek Jeter, recovering from a broken ankle, was progressing as planned.
abstract: New York Yankees 40-and-over pitchers Andy Pettitte and Mariano Rivera face hitters in simulated game; shortstop Derek Jeter, recovering from broken ankle, is progressing as planned; other Yankees items noted.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ 40-and-over pitchers, Andy Pettitte and Mariano Rivera, faced hitters in a simulated game. Shortstop Derek Jeter, recovering from a broken ankle, was progressing as planned.

headline.seo: Andy Pettitte and Mariano Rivera Throw; Jeter Shows Progress
headline.main: Creaking Sounds From Pettitte, Rivera and Jeter Are Growing Fainter
headline.print_headline: Creaking Sounds From Pettitte, Rivera and Jeter Are Growing Fainter
